entries.cant_work: You have too many other things to do at the moment. Come back when you have more time.
entries.dontknowyou_1: Go away! I don't need your help.
entries.next: I have nothing else for you to help me with.
entries.notit_1: Unfortunately, I'm not looking for anything right now.
entries.notyet: You can't help me right now.
entries.npc_1_1: I'm looking for my master. Have you seen him? I suppose you haven't unless you've visited the pirate hideout. Oh? You haven't heard? My master was kidnapped. Will you rescue him?
entries.npc_2_1: I'm not exactly sure where this pirate hideout is, but I can enter the information, that I do know, in your datapad.
entries.npc_3_1: You're not very good at lying.
entries.npc_4_1: I only know the general location of where it might be found. However, I have heard that many treasures can be found in a pirate hideout. Oh, and you may want to bring friends with you. It won't be easy.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: I've entered the information in your datapad. You should go look for him.
entries.npc_breech_1: Where is my sister? I must find my sister! You! Will you go find her? She was captured by pirates! They demand that we pay some sort of ransom for her return. Please help me! You can find the pirate hideout here; I've marked it on your map.
entries.npc_failure_1: My master? You couldn't save him? I'm hopeless!
entries.npc_more_1_1: I have no other information for you except that the hideout can be found in the mountains. Please help me. I'm desperate!
entries.npc_noloc_1: Come back later. I may have something for you to do.
entries.npc_reset: I will find someone else to help me, then.
entries.npc_reward_1: I have no reward for you, unfortunately. But thank you for rescuing my master.
entries.player_1_1: Yes, I will rescue him for you.
entries.player_3_1: What other information do you have about this pirate hideout?
entries.player_more_1_1: What other information do you have?
entries.player_sorry: Not yet. I am still looking.
entries.waypoint_description_1: A deserted bunker inhabited by vile pirates. Rumors have said that several nobles are held here for ransom.
